name: Nijikoi no Houkakou
description:
Nijikoi no Houkakou
“Nijikoi no Houkakou” is a romantic-comedy visual novel simulate player as a Senior High School student. The player can determine your life, such as activities of the school, club, home, or even hobbies that affect your skill progressive as you want to be.
And meet the exciting event which suddenly appears, and many friends normally turn incidents into colorful and impressive memories.

We hope you have a great experience while enjoying a lot with the best things we hand for you. Best wishes.
